channel.title: Drug development on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Drug development on FinanClub

item.title: CBAY
item.description: score:143 Chances: CymaBay Therapeutics, Inc. has submitted the Marketing Authorization Application (MAA) for seladelpar for the treatment of primary biliary cholangitis The New England Journal of Medicine has published detailed results from the RESPONSE Phase 3 trial evaluating seladelpar, showing promising data for the drug Gilead Sciences has proposed to acquire CymaBay for $4.
